original_text: And the same John had his raiment of camel's hair, and a leathern girdle about his loins; and his meat was locusts and wild honey.
korean_text: 이 요한은 낙타털 옷을 입고 허리에 가죽 띠를 띠고 음식은 메뚜기와 석청이었더라

sentences.original_text: And same John had his raiment of camel's hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요한은 낙타 털로 만든 옷을 입고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and a leathern girdle about his loins
and his meat was locusts and wild honey
